comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: I was scanning the tyre tracks on the road to see what could be seen and there isn't a car or tractor tyre in sight!  Imagine how much time has passed since that image was captured?  Imagine all the generations of dogs, horses and people that have come and gone since then and the changes that have taken place.  All the while this wonderful snapshot has stopped time in its tracks and nothing has changed therein!  Fantastic!!!
